title: WATCH: Incredible time-lapse video shows formation of icicle
body: OGUNQUIT, Maine (SBG) — A police department in Ogunquit, Maine shared a remarkable time-lapse video of an icicle formation.The  took place over the course of 12 hours on the outside of the city's town hall, according to the .The video starts while it's dark outside and moves into the daylight.
